annotations: My name is Tyrone C. Black. This letter is for Pamela Strain, my mother. I am a man of very few words. I just want the Court to know that my mother is the most selfless and caring person in the world. I currently work as a stationary engineer for the city of Chicago. Before this, I worked at my motherâ€™s school.

My mother is extremely remorseful for her conduct. She is a very spiritual person who has helped many people move forward during difficult times. She is a kind-hearted woman and known around the Chicago and Chicago land area for being an educational leader. I hope that my mom can forgive herself and use her spirituality to help herself as she has helped others.

I know my mother will get through this very difficult period. She has survived many terrible things in her life. I know that she will remain as productive and caring as she has always been. I am proud of her strength and of her doing the right thing.

My mother has helped so many people in her life. She has helped me a great deal and I still need her help. We all do. This is a difficult world. My mother is one of the shining lights that helps us all be better people.
